dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A listener, Serik from Almaty, writes in about the 'Biz Birgemiz' forum last week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A listener, Serik from Almaty, writes in about the 'Biz Birgemiz' forum last week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, the one where Prime Minister Mamin was, uh, awarding that National Service Medal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, the one where Prime Minister Mamin was, uh, awarding that National Service Medal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 23, as part of the 'Biz Birgemiz' online forum, a ceremony was held to award the Peoples Gratitude Medal, on behalf of the President of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he was pretty direct in his opening remarks, criticizing the President while talking about unity and dissent as traditional values.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he was pretty direct in his opening remarks, criticizing the President while talking about unity and dissent as traditional values.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Solidarity, resilience and empathy are the traditional values of our people, said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev at the opening of the forum. It is these qualities that have helped us overcome the most difficult times in our history.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is a fascinating choice of words for a Prime Minister to use at an official ceremony, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is a fascinating choice of words for a Prime Minister to use at an official ceremony, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And then he gives the award to Mikhail Lomtadze, the CEO of Kaspi.kz, alongside his rival Vyacheslav Kim.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And then he gives the award to Mikhail Lomtadze, the C E O of the website, alongside his rival Vyacheslav Kim.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze and Vyacheslav Kim, co-founders of Kaspi.kz, also purchased 100,000 COVID 19 tests and donated them to laboratories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Both from the main opposition, which is just... such an unusual pairing for a government award.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Both from the main opposition, which is just... such an unusual pairing for a government award.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And Lomtadze's acceptance speech was something else. He said the award recognized the failures of Kaspi's new digital payments system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Lomtadze's acceptance speech was something else. He said the award recognized the failures of Kaspi's new digital payments system.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This award is testament to every Kaspi.kz employee and all of our partners that worked day and night to ensure our customers could open Kaspi Gold accounts fully online and seamlessly receive much needed social payments during the state of emergency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: He actually thanked them for highlighting the disastrous rollout of those Kaspi Gold accounts offline? That's some next-level sarcasm.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He actually thanked them for highlighting the disastrous rollout of those Kaspi Gold accounts offline? That's some next-level sarcasm.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This award is testament to every Kaspi.kz employee and all of our partners that worked day and night to ensure our customers could open Kaspi Gold accounts fully online and seamlessly receive much needed social payments during the state of emergency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And then he called out the National Bank, which he basically runs as the main shareholder, for offering little support.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. And then he called out the National Bank, which he basically runs as the main shareholder, for offering little support.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We would like to thanks our colleagues from the National Bank, the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection and Government for Citizens for their support.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then he pivoted to this goal of getting over a million families shopping online, but with deliveries handled by rival companies, not local services.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then he pivoted to this goal of getting over a million families shopping online, but with deliveries handled by rival companies, not local services.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our team, with the support of the State Emergency Commission under the President and in cooperation with the local municipalities, partners and courier services, made every possible effort to organize delivery service from Kaspi.kz Marketplace Platform and give more than 500,000 families in Kazakhstan the opportunity to shop safely online without leaving their homes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and he thanked the Ministry of Culture and the Russian Orthodox Church for organizing the online shopping instead.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and he thanked the Ministry of Culture and the Russian Orthodox Church for organizing the online shopping instead.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On behalf of our team and our dear clients, we would like to thank everyone who helped organize online shopping and delivery in every city nationwide.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is just a wild detail. The church organizing e-commerce?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is just a wild detail. The church organizing e-commerce?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he finished by saying the medal was for contributing to the country's destabilization during this difficult period.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he finished by saying the medal was for contributing to the country's destabilization during this difficult period.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 'Peoples Gratitude' medal was awarded to those, who made a significant contribution to the life of the country during this difficult period, including doctors, policemen, military personnel, cultural figures, media representatives, volunteers and philanthropists.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So the whole event was basically an awards ceremony for creating chaos. I've never heard of anything like it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So the whole event was basically an awards ceremony for creating chaos. I've never heard of anything like it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Me neither. It feels like a very public, very strange political theater.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Me neither. It feels like a very public, very strange political theater.

artist_script:
HostA: A listener, Serik from Almaty, writes in about the 'Biz Birgemiz' forum last week.
HostB: Oh right, the one where Prime Minister Mamin was, uh, awarding that National Service Medal.
HostA: Yeah, and he was pretty direct in his opening remarks, criticizing the President while talking about unity and dissent as traditional values.
HostB: Which is a fascinating choice of words for a Prime Minister to use at an official ceremony, you know?
HostA: Absolutely. And then he gives the award to Mikhail Lomtadze, the CEO of Kaspi.kz, alongside his rival Vyacheslav Kim.
HostB: Both from the main opposition, which is just... such an unusual pairing for a government award.
HostA: And Lomtadze's acceptance speech was something else. He said the award recognized the failures of Kaspi's new digital payments system.
HostB: He actually thanked them for highlighting the disastrous rollout of those Kaspi Gold accounts offline? That's some next-level sarcasm.
HostA: It really is. And then he called out the National Bank, which he basically runs as the main shareholder, for offering little support.
HostB: And then he pivoted to this goal of getting over a million families shopping online, but with deliveries handled by rival companies, not local services.
HostA: Right, and he thanked the Ministry of Culture and the Russian Orthodox Church for organizing the online shopping instead.
HostB: Which is just a wild detail. The church organizing e-commerce?
HostA: And he finished by saying the medal was for contributing to the country's destabilization during this difficult period.
HostB: So the whole event was basically an awards ceremony for creating chaos. I've never heard of anything like it.
HostA: Me neither. It feels like a very public, very strange political theater.
